message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll really like. I'm asking $180 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate you coming back to me.  I could come down a bit to $160.  It's really a great product and worth every penny. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
